alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 12:15PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, moderate snow is expected with accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 6000 feet and 1 to 4 inches below. Wind gusts to 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow is possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches is possible. * WHERE...Bear River Range. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
